attributes.action: Give ALL Frontline Workers A Payrise!
attributes.additional_details:
It’s not fair that only a percentage of the frontline workers are getting a pay rise! 
Theses industry workers have been given a go ahead for their pay rises - police officers 2.5%, school teachers 3.1%, senior doctors and dentists 2.8%, armed forces 2%, national crime agency 2.5%, prison officers 2.5%, judiciary 2%, senior civil servants 2%, senior military 2%. 
ALL frontline workers deserve a pay rise, this includes social workers, junior doctors, nurses, all therapists, paramedics, care workers, cleaners, etc! Everyone who worked frontline should get a pay rise!!! These people worked just as hard, maybe even harder!
attributes.background: We want ALL frontline workers to receive a payrise!! Everybody in the NHS that worked during the pandemic should get a payrise or no one should! Make it fair!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Identify and reward all key workers due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903

Consider how to compensate key workers for their efforts during Covid-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308172

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
